title: Got invited but can't create account
body:
So I got the invitation on 2016-11-08 and i just check my gmail but now when i click on the CREATE YOUR PBE ACCOUNT the new page says "Something went wrong".

and the link say euw instead of na..i'm confuse right now.

replies.body: Can you try clearing your browser's cache, then try visiting the [**NA PBE Signup**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)? Please let me know if this worked for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XF4rH5KQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-11T04:36:19.761+0000)
>
> Can you try clearing your browser's cache, then try visiting the [**NA PBE Signup**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)? Please let me know if this worked for you.

Nope its not working, it only take me to pending which is weird since I already got an invitation and I still cant create account ;(

Are you sure you're logging in with the account that was invited? If you have multiple accounts, you may have them all associated with the same email address, so I'd double-check that you're using the right account! ^.^
